Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory895.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Halo Fortress Main Keep', 2: 'Before the Prison Riot'}
{3: 'Before the Prison Riot, Halo Fortress Main Keep'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiShixianraodong01.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiShixianraodong02.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Death of Iron', 3: '【kuroname】 died thirty years ago.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Click—the trigger is pulled.'}
{2: 'Death of Iron', 3: '...But you look... You look just as young as you were thirty years ago. How is that possible?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Death of Iron', 3: "I sense no power of the Sanctuary within you, but the dream nets didn't react, either.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Death of Iron', 3: 'You... what exactly are you?', 4: '1'}
{3: "A violent buzzing pierces your mind like needles drilling into bone. Right now, you can't process the Death of Iron's confusing words."}
{3: 'An overwhelming, suffocating pressure seizes your mind, like countless blades scraping against each other next to your ears, wildly tearing at your eardrums.'}
{3: "Urgh... can't... move."}
{3: 'You focus your mind on fighting it. This is the only way to break free from control, just like in your previous battle with the Archangel.'}
{3: "Suddenly, the dreamcatcher on Death of Iron's desk begins to tremble."}
{3: 'A storm sweeps through the fortress. Clear, resonant chimes ring from every corner, converging like rivers flowing into the sea and rising together into earth-shattering noise.'}
{3: 'This means that Watanabe has begun the military operation to seize the fortress.'}
{3: "Momentarily surprised by the Demon's sudden intrusion, Death of Iron's imposing aura falters."}
{3: 'You seize this moment—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Swish-slash—'}
{3: 'Using both arms, you shield your head with all your strength as you crash into the glass window beside you.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFallNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Nauseating weightlessness suddenly crawls up your spine, and as the world spins, you cry out—'}
{1: '0', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiShixianraodong02.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFallNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory38.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The raven shrieks as she dives down, sweeping over the chaotic military formations below. Gray feathers trail behind her as she changes form in mid-air and catches you in her embrace.'}
{2: 'Nirvatia', 3: '...【kuroname】, are you hurt?', 4: '1'}
{2: "We've bought enough time.", 3: '60'}
{2: "Continue as planned. We're going to open the city gates!", 3: '61'}
{2: 'Nirvatia', 3: 'Copy.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Nirvatia beats her black wings as she holds you tightly and dives toward the fortress gates.'}
{3: "You draw a sidearm from your waist. It's the one Morigan had hidden before you entered the city."}
{3: 'Then, aiming at the blood-red sun overhead, you pull the trigger.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory315.png'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: "Demons have infiltrated the fortress! Patrol units, tighten security! Don't let even a fly slip through!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldiers', 3: 'Yes, sir!'}
{3: 'After noticing signals from the dreamcatcher, about a hundred soldiers quickly assemble into emergency formation, hastily setting up defenses around the city gates against the brewing storm.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Outgoing Soldier', 3: 'Hey, so your squad got called, too, huh?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Outgoing Soldier', 3: 'I heard that you were playing cards with some prisoners one time, and when one of them called your bluff, you shot him dead. Is that true?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Angry Soldier', 3: "No, that's not true. I shot everybody dead.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Angry Soldier', 3: 'Ah, screw it, forget about cards. I got dragged out here to stand guard right after I finally drew a damn good hand.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Outgoing Soldier', 3: "Why are you complaining? They're hunting Demons inside, while we're just here soaking up some sun and waiting to get paid.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Outgoing Soldier', 3: "Anyway, we've killed off most of the rebels already, so who else could—", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Whoosh—A sharp, prolonged noise pierces the sky behind them.'}
{3: 'The soldiers turn around in terror as a red signal flare streaks through the sky, leaving a trail of flame and slicing a brilliant gash across the heavens.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: "Wh-what's that?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Outgoing Soldier', 3: "Sir! It's a signal flare!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: 'Fool! I mean over there—!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Hearing the officer's horrified voice, everyone turns in alarm toward the distant horizon."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory393.jpg'}
{3: 'In the billowing smoke, countless black figures emerge.'}
{3: 'The shadows steadily grow larger, soon merging into a single, formidable battle line.'}
{3: "At the very front, a gray battle flag juts into the sky and flutters in the wind, guiding the soldiers' advance."}

{1: '1', 2: 'Taco', 3: 'Warriors! Thirty years ago, on this soil beneath our feet, our fathers faced blades and spilled blood. They charged fearlessly until they drove the Demons back to Hell!', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Taco', 3: 'For thirty long years, the Sanctuary has twisted our history, clipped our wings, and kept us penned like livestock in the sun. We were reduced to tail-wagging beasts begging for scraps.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Taco', 3: "Now it's our turn to take up our fathers' banners and set the stage for revolution once more!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Taco', 3: 'Warriors! Today is our day! Let these traitors see who the real beasts are, and who the true butchers are!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A whistle cuts through the air, followed by deafening roars that rattle mountains and plains.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory315.png'}
{3: 'Horse hooves trample the earth with unstoppable force, charging toward the fortress defenses. Dust billows like surging ocean waves.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: 'En-enemy attack!!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: 'Everyone, prepare for bat—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: 'Gurgk...!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'The sandy ground beside the officer suddenly collapses, and a black shadow bursts out at lightning speed. With swift, precise strikes, the phantom drives its blade straight into his heart.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Outgoing Soldier', 3: 'Who? Ugh...!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiChopping01.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiChopping01.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Angry Soldier', 3: 'You...!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHitQiangHuo.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHitQiangHuo.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'A cold gleam flashes. Gunpowder smoke drifts through the air as two corpses fall like cut sticks, terror frozen on their faces as they plunge into the blood-soaked mud.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'At the same time, waves of anguished cries and gunfire echo from various points below the city.'}
{3: 'As the rebel forces advance like a surging tide, assassins wipe out the guards before they can mount a counterattack.'}
{3: 'Clang... clang...'}
{3: 'The city gate slowly rises as dark red rust flakes off like congealed blood. The grinding hinges are drowned out by gunfire, like a dying giant knocking on the gates of Hell.'}
{3: 'At the end of darkness, you and Nirvatia walk upon the sea of corpses, slowly emerging from the city gate and bathing in the radiance of rebirth.'}
{2: 'Halo Fortress has opened its gates!', 3: '180'}
{2: "Follow Gray Raven's banner and go to war! Reclaim the glory and dignity that belongs to you!", 3: '181'}
{3: "Gunfire and battle cries surge like a rising wave, growing more intense and staining the decayed earth blood red in response to 【kuroname】's call."}
{1: "This is the moment when all of humanity's humiliation and fear transform into unstoppable wrath.", 3: '40', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{3: "This is the moment when all of humanity's humiliation and fear transform into unstoppable wrath."}
{1: 'It ignites the <phonetic=war><color=#ff4e4eff>furnace</color></phonetic> powerful enough to devour the old world and fuel rebirth.', 3: '40'}
{3: 'It ignites the <phonetic=war><color=#ff4e4eff>furnace</color></phonetic> powerful enough to devour the old world and fuel rebirth.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory49.jpg'}
{1: 'Halo Fortress', 2: 'Meanwhile'}
{3: 'Halo Fortress.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rebel Soldier', 3: 'Attack!!', 4: '1'}
{3: "A dozen rebel soldiers charge ahead. They are the first to break into the fortress's main keep."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: 'Drop!', 4: '1'}
{3: "The defending soldiers hiding on both sides pull the ropes in unison, and the main keep's open iron gate comes crashing down with a thunderous roar."}
{2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: 'Fire!!!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The muskets fire at the same time, belching scalding smoke as the flames instantly engulf the enemies.'}
{3: 'Agonized wails fill the air as the warriors charging at the front collapse, dying in pools of blood.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Half-blind Soldier', 3: 'Forward!!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The survivors from the rear trample over their fallen comrades, charging into the bloody smoke and gunpowder, and continue their assault with unwavering resolve.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: 'Hold the line!! We must stop the rebels here!!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: 'Kill them all!! Long live the Iron Army! Long live Generalissimo Death of Iron!!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The defenders have no time to reload and are forced to use bayonets for a counter-attack. Amid deafening battle cries, both sides clash in brutal close-quarters combat.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory843.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory843.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0.3'}
{3: 'Bloodshot, murderous eyes lock onto each other as countless vicious, bloodthirsty faces clash, tearing each other apart in the crimson mist.'}
{3: 'In the gruesome battle of flying blood and flesh, both sides have squads of soldiers crouching in the rear, advancing with the front line.'}
{3: 'Armed with daggers, they check each corpse on the ground one by one. Whenever they find a body with an intact heart, they drive their blades deep between the ribs.'}
{3: '"Sendaway"—this is what people in the Age of Cataclysm call the practice of clearing battlefields and preventing corpses from transforming.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: 'Form ranks! Volley fire formation—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'War drums beat as the defending forces in the rear regroup, quickly forming a line with the front rank kneeling and the rear rank standing.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Half-blind Soldier', 3: 'Get out of the way! Move!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'While their comrades fight on the front line, the defenders raise their muskets, aiming into the chaotic battlefield where friend and foe are impossible to distinguish.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Half-blind Soldier', 3: 'Assault squad! This way, follow me!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Soldiers', 3: 'Yes, sir!'}
{3: 'In this critical moment, the veteran makes a split-second decision and leads a few soldiers carrying explosives in a flanking charge.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Everyone, get down.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Half-blind Soldier', 3: '...Watanabe?!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Suddenly, a military command thunders through every rebel soldier's mind, echoing so clearly it feels like the voice is speaking directly into their ears."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Half-blind Soldier', 3: 'Get down!!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Almost simultaneously, the rebel soldiers break free from their fights and dive to either side.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: "Wh-what's happening?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Army Warrior', 3: 'Sir... the g-gate!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: 'Oh n-no, the Halo Cannon!!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiReturnActivity/FxUiBlindBox.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'A streak of golden light appears, melting through the steel walls.'}
{3: 'Soon, countless brilliant beams of light follow, piercing through the main keep like a rainbow, tearing the world apart as they surge forward with thunderous roars.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryExplosionL.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryExplosionR.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Loud roars shake heaven and earth as the impenetrable fortress crumbles, collapsing like a withered tree in a storm and falling into ruin.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}

{3: 'Brilliant torrents of energy vaporize everything in their path, like a massive sword forged from fused meteors. Its blade roars upward, tearing the crimson demon fortress vertically apart, shaking heaven and earth.'}
{3: 'The miracle from thirty years past transcends time, descending once more upon humanity.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1210.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory49.jpg'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: '...Cough, cough cough!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The officer clears away the sand and stones pinning him down as scalding blood spatters across his face like rain.'}
{2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: 'Anyone... anyone still alive?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: '—Eek?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly, an iron grip lifts him up from the sea of blood and presses a sharp blade against his throat.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The war is over... for now.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The crimson knight wipes the sticky blood from their face and basks in the glow of victory.'}
{3: 'A massive cannon towers behind him. Its barrel stretches several meters long and is forged entirely from Sanctuary mithril. Searing, deadly heat still billows from its gaping mouth.'}
{3: 'Loaded with ordinary shells yet capable of destroying entire cities, this deadly weapon once slew gods and was revered as the pinnacle of human technology before the Cataclysm.'}
{3: '"Halo Cannon! Halo Cannon!"'}
{3: '—Cry the humans rallying by the knight.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Open your damn eyes and see! Who overpowered this hotbed of violence? Who crushed the arrogant pride of you worthless scum!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiSummerSign/FxUiSummerSignSun01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A pillar of light illuminates the battlefield, like a spear piercing through the clouds, shining on the faces of countless avengers.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiSummerSign/FxUiSummerSignSun01.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: "D-don't kill me, I surrender!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What about the innocents who died under your murderous blades? When they begged for mercy on their knees, did you ever show them this twisted, despicable face?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: "I'm the quartermaster! I know lots of secrets! I'll be useful if you keep me alive!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Silence! The Army's Eagle Banner is ashamed of your cowardice and treachery. The reborn world will forever condemn your betrayal.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I, Watanabe, in the name of the true fourth Generalissimo of the Iron Army, now declare my final judgment on you, filthy traitors of Halo Fortress—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: 'D-Death of Iron is still alive!!!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Watanabe hesitates just as his blade pierces the flesh.'}
{2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: 'I know... I know where he is...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1005', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront17.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.3'}
{2: 'Army Sergeant', 3: 'Urgh—ahhh!!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Before he can finish, monstrous tentacles pierce his chest from behind.'}
{3: "Blood sprays onto Watanabe's face."}
{1: '1005', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront17.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0.3'}
{3: 'Behind the collapsed corpse, countless gleaming tentacles slowly rise, like a venomous octopus going for its prey.'}
{3: 'Watanabe will never forget the person who wields this monstrous power.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Death of Iron', 3: "Words from the defeated are the most vicious of deceptions. This is the second time I've had to teach you that.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'At the sight of that twisted face they so utterly despise, the surrounding rebel fighters glare and grit their teeth, burning with rage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Half-blind Soldier', 3: 'Blood for blood!!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A veteran soldier holds up his blade and charges ahead of the formation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rebel Soldier', 3: 'Death of Iron!!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The soldiers follow closely behind, charging past bloody corpses toward their common enemy.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The enemy stands motionless, chin raised slightly in contempt.'}
{3: 'Golden light flickers in his pupils as he gazes down upon a swarm of ants making their final, futile attempt.'}
{3: 'Submit.'}
{3: 'The clamorous battlefield instantly falls into deathly silence.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiShixianraodong01.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiShixianraodong02.prefab'}
{3: 'Time seems to freeze. Every soldier is frozen in place, eyes wide but unable to move.'}
{3: 'These are shackles that only Demons can break free from.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiShixianraodong03.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'A roar tears through the silence as crimson lightning streaks forth, plunging into the blinding golden thorns.'}

{3: "The tentacles can't keep up with the Demon Knight's speed. Watanabe raises his Trailblade high and strikes Death of Iron's face with a momentum so fast it breaks the sound barrier, imperceptible to humans."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'Clang!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Death of Iron', 3: 'Too slow.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Blades clash, sending sparks flying in all directions. A powerful shockwave sends the mind-controlled soldiers flying and crashing into the ruins.'}
{3: "Death of Iron's blade suddenly drops as he steps to the side, driving his knee hard into Watanabe's abdomen, snapping bones."}
{3: 'He then immediately extends his right leg, kicking Watanabe several meters away and smashing the stone wall ahead to pieces.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Death of Iron', 3: 'Get up! Did you forget everything I taught you?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Death of Iron raises his sword and walks into the swirling dust.'}
{3: 'Right then, the sound of steel striking the ground echoed through the ruins.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...My mentor would never be reckless enough to walk into an enemy trap.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The crimson firearms scattered across the battlefield rise one by one, taking the place of fallen soldiers to form battle lines that completely surround Death of Iron.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Death of Iron', 3: "Hah. Demon's little tricks.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Listen... to the wrath of this land!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}

{3: "The moment the barrage erupts, the golden tentacles on Death of Iron's back suddenly twist and contract, lashing wildly around his body in all directions to form a constantly shifting golden barrier."}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Gunfire erupts from all directions, and crimson blood rains down as the rebels charge toward the defensive line formed by the golden tentacles.'}
{3: 'The battlefield suddenly transforms into a blazing whirlpool, with scorching bullets falling like broken pearls, crackling as they hit the ground.'}
{3: 'Having regained the upper hand through overwhelming firepower, Watanabe grips his weapon tightly and charges forward in a low crouch.'}
{3: 'Using his vision enhanced by demonic power, he finds a blind spot that the tentacles cannot fully protect.'}
{3: 'Going against an enemy whose techniques shift in the blink of an eye, Watanabe quickly makes a decision—'}
{3: "Watanabe seizes the perfect moment to strike with full force at the weak point in the iron barrier's otherwise flawless defense."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Death of Iron', 3: 'I got you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The tentacles suddenly stop swaying and thrust outward like thorns.'}
{3: 'Watanabe suddenly stops his attack, jumps back, and raises both arms in defense.'}
{3: 'Countless tentacles brush straight past him to coil around the firearms spitting flames of fire.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Death of Iron', 3: 'Hmph. On our journey to seal the Rift of Chaos, the Demons slain by the Three Ashfire Heroes were far beyond anything you mortal fools could imagine.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The golden, thorned tentacles seem to have extraordinary power. They coil tightly around the firearms like pythons suffocating their prey.'}
{2: 'Death of Iron', 3: "Even the Locust Flame Demons under <phonetic=Death Lord>Nyarlathotep's</phonetic> command cowered at the sight of my blade...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Death of Iron', 3: 'What makes you think you can defeat me by serving the Demons?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The tentacles coil and slam down with immense force. Dozens of demonic firearms shatter like glass, dissolving into swirling crimson powder.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Useless. As long as I have strength left, these firearms will keep appearing.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As he speaks, the shattered weapons reassemble and turn into a new batch of firearms that continue circling around Watanabe.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Death of Iron', 3: "Tch. Looks like the conditions for agents to use abilities are the same, whether they're Angels or Demons.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The tentacles behind Death of Iron violently thrust forth again, and just like before, they bite down tightly on the weapons Watanabe summoned.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What comes next is a deadly struggle of stamina and willpower.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Death of Iron', 3: 'You fought your way in here with such effort. How can you still sound so calm and confident?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I have my reasons... I must win.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe wipes the fresh blood from the corner of his mouth and looks at his comrades lying motionless on the ground.'}
{3: 'Death of Iron laughs disdainfully. He pauses his assault and turns to face the distant battlefield where battle cries are shaking the heavens.'}
{2: 'Death of Iron', 3: 'We need to get more people... to witness the final moments of your arrogant ideals.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Death of Iron', 3: "A quiet death would be meaningless for either of us. Let's go where more people can witness our duel.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Death of Iron', 3: "A hundred years from now, the Sanctuary's chroniclers will write your stubborn resistance and death as a mere footnote in the Iron Army's suppression of chaos and restoration of order.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Hearing his enemy's arrogant conclusion, Watanabe responds with a defiant smile."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Your arrogant declaration means absolutely nothing to this revolution.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I don't know what kind of power the Supreme Heaven gave you to so completely corrupt human consciousness—turning a once-invincible Vice Generalissimo into a butcher who now only slaughters his own people.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But as a member of the Iron Army and as the son of Generalissimo Gyrfalcon, I must bring justice to the Three Ashfire Heroes who once fought for the people.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I will kill you, for the real Ballard, for those still fighting, and for those who can no longer fight!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The shell that has become a Sanctuary agent sneers in response.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Death of Iron', 3: '...Are you ready to have your real final lesson?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'On the bloody ground, gunfire rumbles like frenzied war drums and moves ever closer.'}
{3: 'Watanabe straightens his hat and swings his Trailblade in a clean motion, shaking off the blood.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Bring it on. Let this war's finale be the backdrop for our duel.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We shall fight with our blood until death claims us!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The two men walk toward the even grander and more magnificent battlefield—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory317.png', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Toward the grave that awaits them.', 3: '50', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Toward the grave that awaits them.'}
{1: 'Toward a future that will devour the past.', 3: '50', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{3: 'Toward a future that will devour the past.'}
